Articles.Content: I'd like to be able to have a ground-based 'catapult' style launch-assist for spaceplanes, something that'd accelerate them to a high enough speed to use air-breathing engines only start above a certain airspeed.

We have this in 0.9: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103511-Pre-Release-0-90-FIXED-Netherdyne-Mass-Driver-Mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103511-Pre-Release-0-90-FIXED-Netherdyne-Mass-Driver-Mod)

Prob won't work now, but someone tried it.
